definition[0]: a large road vehicle used to carry goods
example[1]: His car was taken away on the back of a breakdown truck.
definition[1]: a railway vehicle that is part of a train and carries goods
definition[2]: a simple piece of equipment on wheels used to move heavy objects
definition[3]: to take something somewhere by truck
example[3]: They ordered sand to be trucked in from the desert.
definition[4]: to go, move, or travel quickly
example[4]: We were trucking on down to Jackâ€™s place.
example[5]: Crude oil would be imported on tankers and trucked to the pipeline.
